Read: Small Things Like These by Claire Keegan üìö  ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ
A beautiful wee book that drew me in quietly & has stuck in my mind. Ireland 1985, A gentle slightly troubled man digs deep. ‚ÄúHunters in the Snow‚Äù on the cover seems fitting as the village approaches a snowy Christmas.
